defaultSeverity.title: Default severity level
defaultSeverity.description: Default level of the severity for diagnostics without severity provided by the language server.

ignoreCodes.title: Diagnostic codes to ignore
ignoreCodes.description: Codes of diagnostics which should not be shown in the panel nor highlighted in the editor.

ignoreMessagesPatterns.title: Diagnostic messages to ignore
ignoreMessagesPatterns.description: Regular expressions matching messages of diagnostics which should not be shown in the panel nor highlighted in the editor.

disable.title: Disable
disable.description: Disable this feature. Requires reloading JupyterLab to apply changes.
